en2: I enjoy good repute, avoid disrepute, and work with reputable people.
I didn't want to disrupt the meeting, so I waited until it ended to ask my question.
I managed to disprove the rumor with solid evidence.
I always dispose of garbage properly to protect the environment.
I reveal the truth to my friend, and this revelation changes our relationship.
I heard my voice reverberate through the empty hall.
I revere my teacher and show great reverence for her guidance.
I felt ridiculous wearing such an oversized hat in public.
I found it hard to adapt because of the company's rigid rules.
I underwent rigorous training before starting my new job.
I didn't want the heavy rain to ruin our picnic plans.
I measured the salinity of the water, noticed salt crystals on the shore, and confirmed it was a saline environment.
I noticed an increase in salivation, and saliva started to pool in my mouth.
I learned that the enzyme lactase helps digest lactose in milk.
I can envision a future where renewable energy dominates, and I envisage myself contributing to that change.
I worked hard to stabilize the project and improve its financial stability.
I feel stable in my job now, but the market situation is still quite unstable.
I could barely utter a word after hearing his strange utterance.
I felt victimized at work because of my opinions.
I have learned to accept the vicissitudes of life with patience.
I was shocked by the vicious attack in the news.
I live in the vicinity of the city center, so I can walk to work.
I am trying to wean myself off caffeine by drinking more water.
I don't want to wear out my shoes too quickly.
I wiped the table after dinner to clean up the crumbs.
I decided to withdraw my application after reconsidering the job offer.
I couldn't help but yawn during the long meeting.
I checked my zodiac sign to see what the stars say about my future.
I joined the workers' union to support better working conditions.
I found abundant evidence to support my theory.
I used a towel to absorb the spilled water because it was very absorbent.
I have absolute trust in the system, but I don't agree with absolutists who refuse any compromise.
I was absent from work yesterday because I was feeling sick.
I was shocked by his abrupt departure without saying goodbye.
I try to stay abreast of the latest news in technology.
I accidentally abraded my knee when I fell off my bike.
I noticed an abnormal pattern in the data that needed further investigation.
I observed how the laser ablates the surface of the metal during the experiment.
I always abide by the rules at my workplace.
I felt a sharp pain in my abdomen after eating too much.
I support efforts to abolish outdated laws that no longer serve the public.
I waited for the storm to abate before leaving the house.
I had to abandon my plans due to unforeseen circumstances.
I have allergies whenever I breathe in too much pollen in spring.
I dropped the ball and it fell to the ground because of gravity.
I decided to study entomology because I've always been fascinated by insects.
I shook the box and heard something rattle inside.
I always shake the bottle before using it.
I love watching the cherry trees blossom in spring.
